document_data.name: Silvershield Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Silvershield Hall''' was a [[dwarven]]-owned and operated tavern found in [[Myth Drannor]].{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves|75}}
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the far-western side of the city, in the district of [[Sheshyrinnam]].{{Template:Cite book/Cormanthyr: Empire of the Elves/Map}}
document_data.Structure: It was a massive two-story structure built atop a two-level cellar. The ground level housed the main taproom, with offices and storage on the floor above and the brewery built into the converted cellar.
document_data.Services: [[Arrak Mithrose]] was the owner of Silvershield Hall, one of the few dwarves who ran a business within the city. He employed a staff made up entirely of other dwarves along with some [[human]]s.
